text: $(l)Actions$(), sometimes known as effects among other things, are a required part of any spell.
These components decide what a spell primarily does, with actions that allow starting fires,
healing the sick, moving things around, and more!
There must be at least one action in every spell, but there can be numerous if the containing

pages.title: Descriptors
text: Each Action may be paired with multiple Descriptors.
Click above to learn more about how Descriptors function.
